channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12038] Replace internal uses of signatures with byte[] and String tableNames to use the TableName equivalents.
item.description: Signatures with byte[] and String table name variables were deprecated in favor of a TableName input. Replace all byte[] and String table name variables with TableName types.
item.summary: Replace internal uses of signatures with byte[] and String tableNames to use the TableName equivalents.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Replaced lots of HTable constructors from the byte[] version to the TableName version
Removed lots of cases of HTable(... byte[] tableName ... ) and replaced them with TableName variants.
Committed this nice cleanup in tests to branch-1+ Thanks Solomon Duskis

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #5593 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/5593/)
HBASE-12038 Replace internal uses of signatures with byte[] and String tableNames to use the TableName equivalents (Solomon Duskis) (stack: rev b5783795cded0f5d52dd9c524d964ec6efc0046a)
